name: Spardyr
description:
We've all experienced a crushingly hard test at school, so why not re-imagine that experience as a top-down shooter where you shoot down bad grades.

DISCLAIMER: This game was made in 48 hours as part of a challenge so please don't expect a high level of polish and expect bugs, in the future I will upload newer versions of the game with less or no obvious glitches.

Please note that this is my first time using Unity and C# all of the knowledge I used in this game was learned within the 48 hour period.
